survey_name: Patient Satisfaction Survey for Telehealth Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate patient satisfaction with telehealth services provided by healthcare facilities, focusing on ease of use, quality of care, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ease of scheduling your telehealth appointment?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ease of scheduling your telehealth appointment?

questions.question_text: Which of the following issues did you encounter during your telehealth appointment? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Ensure the options are clear and concise.

script.question_text: Which of the following issues did you encounter during your telehealth appointment? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of care you received during your telehealth appointment?
questions.client_notes: Use a clear rating scale. Avoid neutral options to encourage decisive feedback.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of care you received during your telehealth appointment?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future telehealth services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future telehealth services?

questions.question_text: Would you prefer telehealth over in-person visits for follow-up appointments?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/depends question to gauge preference.
